game.name: Dicedus
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Dive into the enchanting world of Dicedus, where everything's made of coloured cardboard. Gather dice and artifacts to battle in contests of wit for the title of Supreme Mage. Each game offers a unique experience, explore all the combinations and forge your own playstyle.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dive into the enchanting world of Dicedus, where everything's made of coloured cardboard. Gather dice and artifacts to battle in contests of wit for the title of Supreme Mage. Each game offers a unique experience, explore all the combinations and forge your own playstyle.
